title: Probing the influence of crosslinkers on the properties, response, and degradation of enzymatic hydrogels for electrochemical glucose biosensing through fluorescence analysis
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,9514-9528
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA00265B, Paper
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Jancarlo Diaz-Gonzalez, L. G. Arriaga, Jannu R. Casanova-Moreno
The combination of microscopy, spectroscopy, and electrochemical techniques reveals crosslinker effects in enzymatic hydrogels and allows probing for a possible degradation mechanism of these gels.
